name: Dice Forts
description:
A short game made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam about building forts out of dice to protect domino towers.

d20 dice model was made by Anachronist and can be found here

Impact sound effect was made by Kenny and can be found here

Music:

"Pleasant Porridge" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
